body:
Okay sup guys, I am coloring your speed art for free. I have the newest version of Photoshop and I will be shading and using gradient and all that good stuff. But you have to draw the thing you want me to draw.
Dimensions: (Example. 720 pixels by 1280 pixels.
Color: give me a picture of your minecraft skin
Picture: Go to imgur and upload your picture..
